param.name: fieldLayoutContentPlugins
param.label: Prepare Layouts using Content Plugins
param.description: Select Yes if you need CMS Content plugins content.prepare to be triggered on the layouts. Select No if you do not need CMS Content plugins content.prepare to be triggered.

param.default: Note layouts use user supplied content. This could be an issue for some content plugins. Please use carefully.

param.name: fieldLayoutIcons
param.label: Icons Display
param.description: Optionally override this fields icon display.

param.name: fieldLayoutInputDesc
param.label: Input Description
param.description: Enable or disable if the fields description should be attached to the input. This will display the description as a tooltip when hovering or clicking an input. Note Info Icon or Text will still display regardless of this value.

param.name: terms_output
param.label: Output
param.description: Select how the terms and conditions is output.

param.name: terms_type
param.label: Type
param.description: Input the substitution supported type of terms and conditions this field is (e.g. Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy, etc..). If left blank will default to Terms and Conditions.

param.name: terms_url
param.label: URL
param.description: Input the substitution supported URL to the terms and conditions page.

param.name: terms_text
param.label: Terms and Conditions
param.description: Input the substitution supported terms and conditions.

param.name: terms_display
param.label: Display
param.description: Select how to display the terms and conditions.

param.name: terms_width
param.label: Width
param.description: Input the size in pixels (e.g. 400) or percent (e.g. 100%) of the width of the terms and conditions iframe or modal window.

param.name: terms_height
param.label: Height
param.description: Input the size in pixels (e.g. 200) or percent (e.g. 100%) of the height of the terms and conditions iframe or modal window.

param.name: terms_duration
param.label: Duration
param.description: Select how long consent should last from the date consent was given before the user must give consent again.

param.name: terms_duration_custom
param.label: Custom Duration
param.description: Input the strtotime relative date (e.g. +1 DAY, +1 YEAR, +2 YEARS). This will be relative to the date consent was given. Leave blank for a forever duration.

param.name: fieldMinLength
param.label: Minimum Length
param.description: Minimum length of content (0 = no minimum)

param.name: fieldValidateExpression
param.label: Validation Rule
param.description: Type of input authorized. Note Phone Number is also a simple implementation and will not match every phone number format around the world.
param.option: Single Alphanumeric Word (letters, numbers, and underscores only)
At least 6 characters with 1 lowercase, 1 uppercase, 1 number, and 1 special

param.name: pregexp
param.label: Custom REGEXP Validation
param.description: Input a custom valid REGEXP to match against (e.g. /^[a-zA-Z]+$/). Regular Expressions must be valid in PHP and in JavaScript to function server side and client side. A language string can be used for localized validation rules. If having trouble with Regular Expressions check out https://regexone.com/ to help you get started or a great online tool like https://regexr.com/.

param.name: pregexpsuccess
param.label: Validation Success Message
param.description: Optionally input a message to display if validation was successful. To display this fields title add [FIELDNAME] to your message.

param.name: pregexperror
param.label: Validation Error Message
param.description: Optionally input a clear and helpful message to display if validation failed. To display this fields title add [FIELDNAME] to your message.

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_register
param.label: Registration Forbidden Words
param.description: You can set a list of bad words (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field for registration. Use comma twice (,,) to add comma as bad character.

param.name: fieldValidateForbiddenList_edit
param.label: Profile Edit Forbidden Words
param.description: You can set a list of bad words (separated by comma ,) which are not allowed in this field when user updates his profile in profile edits. Use comma twice (,,) to add comma as bad character.

param.name: integer_minimum

param.description: Enter the minimum value allowed. Default is 0.

param.name: integer_maximum
param.label: Maximum Value Allowed

param.name: integer_step
param.label: Step Value
param.description: Enter how much the value should increase or decrease by when using up and down arrows. Default is 1.
